comments:
Description:
Column data binding doesn't work in subquery.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a data source and dataset.
2. Insert a list, bind it to dataset, define some data binding columns for it.
3. Insert a table to list detail.
4. Insert data items into table detail, use data binding columns.
5. Preview. See attached report.

Result:

Report Designer do not support Column data binding in subquery now. Please make it work and then reassign this bug back to me.

Created an attachment (id=38249)
This design file work well.

I have downloaded the BIRT codes this afternoon and use it to design a new report. It works well.

I have discussed this bug with model team.
The BIRT version of 2006.4.7 has some problems. IF you use that version BIRT to design report, these design file can not work in current BIRT.
This bug has been fixed!
